Azure DataBricks 

    - DataBricks is an Open source analytics spark engine to Process Big Data.
    - DataBricks take advantage of Spark to Process, supporting Scala, Python, SQL languages 
    - DataBricks manages everything from the Cluster, Pool, Availability, Scalability, Security and Much More 
    - Azure DataBricks is the DataBricks combined with the Azure Cloud 



Reference Youtube Channel :

1. https://www.youtube.com/@AnshLambaJSR
    - Topic : Databricks Tutorial (Zero to Hero )
    - Topic : Azure End to End Data Engineering Projects ( From Scratch )
    - Advantage : Real world scenario on DataFactory 

2. https://www.youtube.com/@sumitmittal07
    - Topic : End to End Azure Data Engineering Project by Sumit Sir
    - Practical Domain knowledge & 


3. https://www.youtube.com/@thedatatech
